metadata.title: CVE-2024-22421 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: JupyterLab is an extensible environment for interactive and reproduciblecomputing, based on the Jupyter Notebook and Architecture. Users ofJupyterLab who click on a malicious link may get their `Authorization` and`XSRFToken` tokens exposed to a third party when running an older`jupyter-server` version. JupyterLab versions 4.1.0b2, 4.0.11, and 3.6.7are patched. No workaround has been identified, however users should ensureto upgrade `jupyter-server` to version 2.7.2 or newer which includes aredirect vulnerability fix.

criterions.comment: jupyter-notebook package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
